channel.title: BERT on Bloggin on Responsible AI

item.title: BitFit: A Simpler and More Efficient Approach to Fine-tuning Transformers
item.description: BitFit is a simple yet powerful method for fine-tuning BERT models efficiently. This blog post explores how BitFit works, its benefits, and why it matters.
